basic.Peptide Name: pEM-2 (Derived from the venom of the snake Bothrops asper)
basic.Target Organism: [Ref.27591703] Gram-positive bacteria :Staphylococcus aureus isolates(MIC=5.3 ± 2.3 mg/L, MBC=6.7 ± 2.3 mg/L), Enterococcus faecalis isolates(MIC=6.7 ± 2.3 mg/L, MBC=8.0 ± 0.0 mg/L);Gram-negative bacteria :Pseudomonas aeruginosa isolates(MIC=4.0 ± 3.5 mg/L, MBC=4.0 ± 3.5 mg/L), Acinetobacter baumannii isolates(MIC=4.0 ± 0.0 mg/L, MBC=5.3 ± 2.3 mg/L)
